data.title: Christopher Reid's Personality Unveiled: MBTI, Enneagram and More
data.meta_description: What 16 personality type is Christopher Reid from Screenwriters? Find out Christopher Reid's 16 type, Enneagram, and Zodiac sign in the Soulverse, the comprehensive personality database.
data.text:
Christopher Reid Bio

Christopher Reid is an American actor, comedian, and former member of the hip-hop duo, Kid 'n Play. Born on April 5, 1964, in The Bronx, New York, Reid grew up in a musical family and began his career as a rapper in the 1980s. Along with his childhood friend, Christopher Martin, he formed the duo Kid 'n Play, and together they released four successful albums and several hit singles, including "Rollin' with Kid 'n Play" and "Ain't Gonna Hurt Nobody." After achieving musical success, Reid transitioned to acting, and his first major role was in the 1990 comedy film House Party. He played the lead character of Christopher "Kid" Harris, a high school student who throws a wild party while his parents are out of town. The movie was a commercial success and led to two sequels, House Party 2 and House Party 3, both of which featured Reid and Martin reprising their roles. Reid continued to work in film and television throughout the 1990s and 2000s, with notable roles in the television show Sister, Sister and the films Class Act and Dr. Dolittle 2. He also appeared in the reality television shows Celebrity Fit Club and Real Husbands of Hollywood. In addition to his acting career , Reid has also worked as a writer and producer, and he co-wrote the screenplay for the film House Party 4: Down to the Last Minute. Overall, Christopher Reid is a multi-talented entertainer who has achieved success as a rapper, actor, writer, and producer. His contributions to the hip-hop genre and his iconic role as "Kid" in House Party have made him a beloved figure in popular culture. Reid's career continues to thrive, and he remains a respected and influential voice in the entertainment industry.

What 16 personality type is Christopher Reid?

Christopher Reid, as an ESTJ, tends to be typically very organized and efficient. They like to have a plan and know what is expected of them. They may become frustrated when things are not going according to plan or when there is ambiguity in their environment. ESTJs are loyal and supportive, but they can also be opinionated and inflexible. They value tradition and order, and they often have a strong need for control. Keeping their everyday life in order helps them retain their equilibrium and peace of mind. They exhibit excellent judgment and mental fortitude in the middle of a crisis. They are fervent advocates of the law and set a positive example. Executives are keen to learn about and create awareness about social concerns, which aids them in making sound decisions. They can organize events or campaigns in their communities because of their systematic and people skills. It is typical to have ESTJ pals, and you will admire their zeal. The only disadvantage is that kids may start to anticipate people returning their gestures and be disappointed when they do not.

Which Enneagram Type is Christopher Reid?

Christopher Reid is an Enneagram three personality type with a Two wing or 3w2. 3w2s are charm and persistence machines, capable of entertaining or persuading anyone they come across with. They crave attention from others and may get infuriated if ignored despite their efforts to stand out. They like to always be a step ahead of their game especially when it comes to their accomplishments. Though they want to be recognized for their prowess; these folks still have the heart to help the less fortunate.
